description: This file defines the DockerImage class, a subclass of DockerResource, which manages Docker images including building, creating, reading, updating, and deleting images. It includes methods for building images with buildx, handling build logs, and interacting with Docker API clients.

classes.name: DockerImage
classes.description: A class representing a Docker image, providing methods to build, create, read, update, and delete Docker images, with support for multi-platform builds and detailed logging.

methods.name: get_image_str
methods.description: Returns the full image string including tag, defaulting to 'latest' if no tag is specified.

methods.name: get_resource_name
methods.description: Returns the resource name, which is the image string.

methods.name: buildx
methods.description: Builds the Docker image using Docker buildx, supporting multi-platform builds and various build options.

methods.name: build_image
methods.description: Builds the Docker image, either via buildx or standard Docker API, with detailed logging and progress display.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates the Docker image, invoking build_image and handling caching and force options.

methods.name: read
methods.description: Reads and returns the Docker image object if it exists.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates the Docker image, essentially re-creating it.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes the Docker image from the Docker host.
